path.style: pointer-events: none; stroke-width: 0; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 0; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-opacity: 0; opacity: 100;

text.style: font-family: 'Open Sans', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

path.style: pointer-events: none; stroke-width: 1; fill: rgb(163, 189, 61); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke-opacity: 1; opacity: 1;
